name: UnWind (IllegalRazer)
description:
You are a thread. A infinitely long thread. Using your body, u can maneuver boxes. Your goal is to put boxes on top of each target in the level.

Enjoy in this box moving button pressing door opening body stretching game!

Controls:

W/ Up arrow: Up

S/ Down arrow : Down

A/ Left arrow: Left

D/ Right arrow: Right

Hold Space + WASD/Arrow Keys: pull boxes

R: reset level

Backspace: reset the yourself to the origin

Esc: pause and open menu

Elements:

Red/ Green/ Blue/ Orange Button and Doors: Put a box on top of a button to open/ close the corresponding door!

Target: Put a box on all of the target tiles to complete the level!

Blue Scissors: can be killed when u surround them with your body, but they can also kill u on contact

Red Scissors: can not be killed when u surround them with your body

This is my first ever game! Hope you enjoy it!
